roleset.name: leave

example.name: pretty easy
example.text: Once known as National Distillers & Chemical Corp., the company exited the wine and spirits business and plowed more of its resources into plastics after Mr. Stookey took the chief executive's job in 1986.

after Mr. Stookey took the chief executive's job in 1986
